name: Mirror Maze (ComplexDragon)
description:
W A S D to move

SPACEBAR to think 

---

Sorry I know this isn't really much of a game.  Honestly this was kinda rushed (procrastination) and I didn't really have much of a plan going in, I mostly just started this to try and get out of a kind of creative rut, but if it gives just one person a mild chuckle I will have succeeded.

---

Known issue:

  • Player always starts in the same place, so when you go back if you're not careful you can go ALL the way back.

---

Made for Mini Jam #121 Dec 2022

Fonts and sounds are from KENNEY
